First Commit

Dec-02-2011

I am not much of a blogger but i started this weblog so that i keep writing and also to improve coding skills. This site is based on Jekyll, a ruby based static site generator.

Since this is my first post i would write a little about myself. I am not a hardcore hacker. A little geeky guy with a good sense of humour. I love working in linux. Currently i am using debian. I have an experince of Ubuntu 10.10, Ubuntu 11.04. In a hurry sometimes i use windows but linux brings a big smile on my face sometimes, when i discover some new functionality. I enjoy sleeping. I enjoy reading fiction. At times i spend long time googling random things and reading new things.

I hope this blog proves useful and fullfills the purpose it was meant to.
